attributes.title: NOT MY PRESIDENT
attributes.review:
I installed this app to hope to find my one and only true president, Obama. Instead i got a horrifying, absolutely disgusting cheeto pop up on my screen!! 😡😡😡😡🤬i heard this disgusting orange harms children and minorities!!! how awful. yet some people choose to be blinded by these things, which include evidence if karen’s actually did their research!!!🤪🤪😜🧐🤩
really hope this man isn’t re-elected, or else minorities such as women, people of color, lgbtq+, and people of different beliefs will suffer!!! don’t you want your children to grow up in a better world??😭😭😢😢🥺

attributes.title: Why?!?!?
attributes.review: I recently downloaded this to see what the hype was about. I was very disappointed. When I opened the app, it was bland. Come on mister million dollar loan. Put some effort in! After I looked around I discovered that my phone had a virus that almost resulted in it having to go to the hospital. When I contacted app support, they said it was fake and called it the China virus. How rude. Also the smell was horrible. Not to mention the taste?!? Anyways it was a bad app and do not recommend it to anyone. Very NOT immaculate! Lastly: “Trump 2020🧚🏼‍♂️✨🧚🏾‍♀️✨🧚🏻✨but on a grave”✌🏽😜

attributes.title: cheeto puff😍
attributes.review: i opened the app and i saw a literal chip. he had hands, and was making a fist😰 about to PUNCH! me😢. was very scary, i’ve had nightmares ever since i’ve downloaded it😓. also starts paranormal activity🤔. i walked into the kitchen because i thought if i TRIED. cheeto puff it would leave me alone🥰. but it did NOT. the cheeto puff then PUNCHED ME like i was saying😖. then it touched my little sister in the most inappropriate places😨. then my boyfriend came over and the cheeto puff ??? threw tear gas at him for no reason! i think it’s because he’s a poc🤨. anyway do NOT recommend😚

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: The first thing it did was ask to send me notifications. I clicked yes as I thought it would send me important information. However, it just spammed me with a bunch of hate mail. (I was disgusted to say the least)🐒✨💅🏻🙈🧞‍♀️ Then it asked for my number. I was flattered at first as I haven’t been hit on in a while.✨🧞‍♀️🙈💅🏻 But then i remembered I was a minor and Trump was just doing the normal🙈✨💅🏻❤️(hitting on minors/ sexualizing them) and i had to delete the app. I think it hacked me because i’m still getting notifications though:(

attributes.title: This app POSSESSES YOU and your family😭😍
attributes.review: After getting this app I was very excited to be informed about the Cheetos campaign but after using for a few hours I started noticing evil spirits in my household😨😱😱we immediately evacuated only to see my own family develop orange skin and start screening “FAKE NEWS!!” As you could probably tell this startled me to my core and immediately associated it with this EVIL APP so quickly I deleted it and everything went back to normal! And we all lived happily ever after P.S (I will no longer be voting for the Cheeto 🧚‍♀️✨💖)

attributes.title: Haunted
attributes.review: it was the worst thing ever i was so excited to download it. When it downloaded, everything went dark, five super scary men in donald trump suits started chanting girl in red songs. They then disappeared and i got a call saying that my best friend died, from a guy in a donald trump costume stabbing her. I was petrified, so i immediately deleted it, i have had bad luck for so many days. it is horrible, and after that my toes deflated, i was so scared, this app is haunted and horrible, never ever ever ever get this app, or you will be haunted for the rest of your gosh darn dittily life.

i can’t believe the App Store is still allowing this app to be up. it promotes a criminal known for being homophobic, racist, xenophobic, and sexist and he’s also a literal child rapist but that’s just the tip of the iceberg with his sex offenderness. i can not support this app that promotes such a person and i just found out that he is actually the president of the United States!!!!! i am appalled that this is what we are facing in the USA so i hope that this app gets taken down so as to start to put a stop to this horrible man. anyways luvs acab, blm, and stan Harry Stules for clear skin ✨🧚🏼‍♀️💕

attributes.title: I can’t even, Terrible
attributes.review: As I was putting up my gigantic Trump flag in my window, check my American Flag to make sure it was in PRISTINE condition and put on all my Trump gear, complete with socks😼. Out of nowhere my phone began buzzing uncontrollably! There was a virus on my phone, I was confused until later when I check my Trump app as it again began buzzing uncontrollably, then it started heating up and I had to put it down!  I immediately undownloaded the app and went to the apple store, I also forgot to wear my mask 🤷🏼‍♀️ but that’s okay. DO NOT BY THIS APP IT PUT A VIRUS ON MY PHONE!
